modaldata.description: North Western Provincial Competitions were held on the 24th of October in the Wayamba University Mini Auditorium. It was well-planned and was concluded successfully by the INSL 2022 Mini Organizing committee of Northwestern Province.

Sabaragamuwa  Provincial Competitions were held on the 27th of October at Sabaragamuwa University Mini Auditorium. It was an excellent event that consisted of the essence of the Sabaragamuwa University of Sri Lanka together with the picturesque beauty of the Sabaragamuwa Province.

province.name: Eastern Province

modaldata.description: Eastern Provincial Competitions were held on the 27th of October at the South Eastern University Civil Department Auditorium. The event was a huge success for the Mini Organizing committee of Eastern Province since it was well-planned and organized.

province.location: South Eastern University Civil Department Auditorium

modaldata.description: Colombo North Divisional Competitions were held on the 29th of October at the SLIIT Main auditorium. This was held as the first part of the Western Provincial Competitions which included the teams from the Colombo North region. The event was successfully organized by the Mini Organizing Committee of the Colombo North region.
Southern Provincial Competitions were held on the 30th of October via zoom.

Uva Provincial Competitions were held on the 30th of October at the Uva Wellessa University premises. It was well-planned and was concluded successfully by the INSL 2022 Mini Organizing committee of Uva Province.

Central Provincial Competitions were held on the 12th of November at Rajarata University premises. It was an excellent event well planned and wonderful with the picturesque beauty of the Central Province.
Colombo South Provincial Competitions are to be held on the 12th of November at the NSBM Green University premises.
North Central Provincial Competitions are to be held on the 12th of November.
Northern Provincial Competitions are to be held on the 12th of November.
